title: HiScores

properties.name: description
properties.value: The HiScores is a feature of the Old School RuneScape website which ranks players by their experience in skills, score in Bounty Hunter and Last Man Standing, treasure trail completions, and kill counts at bosses and raids. Unlike the RuneScape HiScores, there are no requirements to be shown on the HiScores other than being ranked in the top 2,000,000 players in a category.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:HiScoresThe RuneScape Classic Wiki also has an article on: classicrsw:HiScores
For various historical records, see Skill mastery.
The Old School RuneScape HiScores on 6 December 2019.

The HiScores is a feature of the Old School RuneScape website which ranks players by their experience in skills, score in Bounty Hunter and Last Man Standing, treasure trail completions, and kill counts at bosses and raids. Unlike the RuneScape HiScores, there are no requirements to be shown on the HiScores other than being ranked in the top 2,000,000 players in a category.

The board can also be separated into the different game modes, this includes the standard HiScores, Ironman mode, Ultimate Ironman mode, Hardcore Ironman, and Tournament Hiscores. When a seasonal game mode is active, such as Deadman Mode or Leagues, they also have separate hiscores.

The Old School RuneScape HiScores can be found on the official website here.

To be featured in the Boss Killcount highscores, you will currently need to kill a boss or complete an activity at least 50 times. This is true for all bosses and Boss Killcount activities, except for Bryophyta, Chambers of Xeric: Challenge Mode, Hespori, Obor, Skotizo, The Corrupted Gauntlet and TzTok-Jad, which all require just 5 'kills' to be featured, and The Mimic and TzKal-Zuk, which just require 1 kill to be featured.

History[edit | edit source]

Category Release Date
Skills/Overall 22 February 2013
Bounty Hunter 28 July 2016
Last Man Standing 11 August 2016
Clue Scrolls 26 January 2017
Beginner Clue Scrolls 11 April 2019
League Points 14 November 2019
Boss Killcount 5 December 2019
Nightmare Killcount 13 February 2020
Game Mode Release Date
Hiscores 22 February 2013
Ironman 13 October 2014
Ultimate Ironman 13 October 2014
Deadman Mode 29 October 2015
Seasonal 21 March 2016
Hardcore Ironman 10 November 2016
Tournament 4 December 2017
Group Ironman 6 October 2021
Hardcore Group Ironman 6 October 2021

Gallery[edit | edit source]

  • The Old School RuneScape HiScores on 26 May 2014.

  • The Old School RuneScape HiScores on 22 November 2017.

  • The Old School RuneScape HiScores on 17 May 2018.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
9 December 2021
(update)

The minimum HiScores killcount requirement for Bryophyta, Chambers of Xeric: Challenge Mode, Hespori, Obor, Skotizo, The Corrupted Gauntlet and TzTok-Jad has been lowered from 10 to 5. The killcount requirement for The Mimic has also been lowered from 2 to 1.

1 December 2021
(update)

The minimum HiScores killcount requirement for TzKal-Zuk has been lowered from 2 to 1.

12 March 2020
(update)

Following the release of boss hiscores, the hiscores became under heavier load, causing them to load and update slowly; to mitigate this, users are now not ranked for bosses where they have a low killcount:

  • Less than 2 for Mimic and TzKal-Zuk
  • Less than 10 for Chambers of Xeric: Challenge Mode, Hespori, Obor, Bryophyta, Skotizo, Corrupted Gauntlet and TzTok-Jad
  • Less than 50 for other bosses
23 January 2014
(update)

The Compare users feature on the hiscores is now functioning correctly.

[[File:HiScores.png|thumb|The ''Old School RuneScape'' HiScores on [[6 December]] [[2019]].]]
[[File:HiScores icon.png|left]]
The '''HiScores''' is a feature of the ''Old School RuneScape'' website which ranks players by their [[experience]] in [[skills]], score in [[Bounty Hunter]] and [[Last Man Standing]], [[treasure trail]] completions, and kill counts at [[boss]]es and [[raid]]s. Unlike the {{RSL|HiScores|''RuneScape'' HiScores}}, there are no requirements to be shown on the HiScores other than being ranked in the top 2,000,000 players in a category.

The board can also be separated into the different game modes, this includes the standard HiScores, [[Ironman]] mode, Ultimate Ironman mode, Hardcore Ironman, and Tournament Hiscores. When a seasonal game mode is active, such as [[Deadman Mode]] or [[Leagues]], they also have separate hiscores.

The ''Old School RuneScape'' HiScores can be found on the official website [https://secure.runescape.com/m=hiscore_oldschool/overall.ws here].

To be featured in the Boss Killcount highscores, you will currently need to kill a boss or complete an activity at least 50 times. This is true for all bosses and Boss Killcount activities, except for [[Bryophyta]], [[Chambers of Xeric/Challenge Mode|Chambers of Xeric: Challenge Mode]], [[Hespori]], [[Obor]], [[Skotizo]], [[The Corrupted Gauntlet]] and [[TzTok-Jad]], which all require just 5 'kills' to be featured, and [[The Mimic]] and [[TzKal-Zuk]], which just require 1 kill to be featured.
